update t_black_app set package_name = #{packageName,jdbcType=CHAR}, app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR}, a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where black_id = #{blackId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_black_app
and package_name like '%' #{name} '%'

select
from t_black_app where black_id > #{bid} order by black_id desc
